price: Dájúdájú A fún (Ànábì) Mūsā ní Tírà nítorí kí wọ́n lè mọ̀nà.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
